headline: Billionaire Peter Thiel to Step Down from Facebook Board to Support President Trump-Aligned Candidates in 2022
author: Jim Hoft
sentences:
TRENDING: Newsmax Host Greg Kelly: "Kevin McCarthy Is a Swamp Snake and We Don't Like Him - In a Moment of Crisis He Wet His Pants" (VIDEO)
It is unclear where Thiel will devote his time and resources, although Bloomberg reports he plans to back Trump’s 2022 agenda.

FOX Business Network reported:
Billionaire investor Peter Thiel is leaving the board of Meta, formerly Facebook, after nearly two decades.
Trump supporter Peter Thiel announced he is leaving Facebook (Meta) board after nearly two decades.
Thiel has already announced support for Blake Masters who is running for the US Senate in Arizona.
Blake Masters was a venture capitalist at Thiel Capital before announcing his run for senate.
Thiel will focus on supporting Trump-aligned candidates in the upcoming 2022 election.
His talents will serve Meta well as he leads the company into a new era” Thiel said.
“It has been a privilege to work with one of the great entrepreneurs of our time.
Mark Zuckerberg’s intelligence, energy, and conscientiousness are tremendous.
